comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content: Hi J_e_n_s, It's likely that this plant was in Petone. According to Te Ara, Todd Motors built an assembly plant in Petone in 1935: Todd Motors developed out of an Otago-based Ford agency, and in 1935 built a car plant in Petone. It assembled Chrysler and Dodge cars, and, by arrangement with the Rootes group, Hillman (including the popular Minx), Humber and Sunbeam models. (Excerpt from 4th to last paragraph of www.teara.govt.nz/en/cars-and-the-motor-industry/3 )
comment.authorname: National Library NZ on The Commons
